title: Deaths of British tourists abroad 2009 to 2014
summary: This statistic shows the Number of deaths British tourists abroad 2009 mopeds or motorcycles in British from 2009/2010 until 2013/2014 .
As can be seen in this statistic , in 2013/2014 the Number of 2014 or crime deaths British was almost 6237 thousand compared with only 1053 in 2012/2013 .
The surge in 2014 crime is one of the most widely reported aspects of rising crime in British recent years .
gold: This statistic shows the number of deaths of British ( UK ) tourists abroad from 2009 to 2014.
5,930 deaths were recorded in 2009/2010 , with numbers rising during the following years.
Though by 2013/2014 numbers had dropped to 4,110 deaths .
